```js
class SnackbarExample extends React.Component {
  constructor(props) {
    super(props);
    this.state = { show: false };
  }

  render() {
    return (
      <React.Fragment>
        <Button onClick={() => this.setState({ show: !this.state.show })}>
          Toggle
        </Button>
        <Snackbar
          show={this.state.show}
          message="Hello, world!"
          actionText="Action"
          onAction={() => this.setState({ show: false })}
        />
      </React.Fragment>
    );
  }
}

<SnackbarExample />;
```
